name: BABA'S LITTLE ITALY BAR AND RESTAURANT

reviews.review_text:
I recently dined here and had an absolute blast. The food was fantastic, especially the sushi - it was incredibly flavorful and creative. I also indulged in a delicious pizza that was cooked to perfection.

The atmosphere was electric thanks to the amazing music playing throughout the evening. The service was top-notch, with friendly and attentive staff. I was even fortunate enough to meet the owner, who was incredibly welcoming and made sure I had a memorable experience.

I would wholeheartedly recommend Baba's little Italy to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience, whether you prefer vegetarian options or enjoy non-vegetarian dishes. It's a must-visit!

Had an amazing dinner here.  My friend was looking to try crab and the Manager suggested the larger mud crab in a garlic cream sauce.  I had the starter calamari.  Both dishes were very well presented and tasted amazing.  The staff are very friendly and the selection on the menu is very wide - should satisfy all tastes.  They have a pizza oven - and their pizzas looked good.  Definitely worth stopping here if youâ€™re in the area.

Loved the food. Not too expensive. We ordered half tandoori which was served sizzling hot. And then Prawns masala medium spice with roti was so delicious. I would absolutely recommend it. Very near to the palolemn beach. Will come back to try other varieties.
